SEARCH
Package civitas.celestis.object

Interface Movable

All Superinterfaces:
Placeable
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseObject, ComponentObject, ImmovableObject
public interface Movable extends Placeable
A movable object can be placed in a simulated world, and can be moved by the Moebius engine.

  • Method Details

    • getAcceleration

      @Nonnull Vector3 getAcceleration()
      Returns the current acceleration of this object.
      Returns:
      The acceleration of this object

    • getRotationRate

      @Nonnull Quaternion getRotationRate()
      Returns the rate of rotation of this object.
      Returns:
      The rate of rotation of this object

    • getVelocity

      double getVelocity()
      Returns the current velocity of this object.
      Returns:
      The velocity of this object

    • getVelocity2

      double getVelocity2()
      Returns the current squared velocity of this object.
      Returns:
      The squared velocity of this object

    • isMoving

      boolean isMoving()
      Returns whether this object is currently moving. This accounts for floating point imprecision of the acceleration vector.
      Returns:
      true if this object's acceleration is not zero

    • isRotating

      boolean isRotating()
      Returns whether this object is currently rotating. This accounts for floating point imprecision of the rate of rotation.
      Returns:
      true if this object's rate of rotation is effectively equal to the identity quaternion

    • getDirection

      @Nonnull Vector3 getDirection()
      Returns the current direction this object is moving in. If this object is not moving, this will return Vector3.ZERO.
      Returns:
      The directional unit vector of this object

    • setAcceleration

      void setAcceleration(@Nonnull Vector3 acceleration)
      Sets the acceleration of this object.
      Parameters:
      acceleration - The new acceleration of this object

    • setRotationRate

      void setRotationRate(@Nonnull Quaternion rotationRate)
      Sets the rate of rotation of this object.
      Parameters:
      rotationRate - The rate of rotation of this object

    • move

      void move(@Nonnull Vector3 amount)
      Moves this object by the specified amount.
      Parameters:
      amount - The amount of movement to apply

    • accelerate

      void accelerate(@Nonnull Vector3 amount)
      Accelerates this object by the specified amount.
      Parameters:
      amount - The amount of acceleration to apply

    • rotate

      void rotate(@Nonnull Quaternion amount)
      Rotates this object by the specified amount.
      Parameters:
      amount - The amount of rotation to apply

    • rotateRate

      void rotateRate(@Nonnull Quaternion amount)
      Rotates the rate of rotation by the specified amount.
      Parameters:
      amount - The amount of rotation to apply to the rate of rotation
